text: The Slovak Football Association (; SFZ) is the governing body of football in Slovakia. The association was founded on 4 November 1938. It organizes the Slovakia national football team for men and women. It is based in Bratislava, the Slovakian capital. == Other websites == * Official website * Slovakia at FIFA site * Slovakia at UEFA site Category:1938 establishments in Europe Category:Football in Slovakia Category:Association football governing bodies in Europe Category:Organizations based in Slovakia Category:Bratislava
title: Slovak Football Association
